prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a massive muscular alien pirate, teal green skin tone, wild long flowing orange hair and beard, heavy gold jewelry, blue vest
feature_prompt: extreme muscle definition, detailed skin texture, realistic texture on beard and hair strands, detailed gold jewelry material
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, flat lighting, low quality, deformed anatomy, solid block color
